entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @jdawsey1 Trump is terrified by the burgeoning COVID-19 epidemic. He is going out of his way to distance himself from it, thinking that if things go wrong, he’ll have others to blame. His sudden interest in drama & chatting with Diamond & Silk are distractions that help quell this anxiety.
